events.name: Vladimir Putin's Surprise Visit to Mariupol
events.wd_label: Vladimir Putin's Surprise Visit to Mariupol
events.wd_description: Russian President Vladimir Putin made an unannounced visit to the captured Ukrainian port city of Mariupol, marking his first trip to Russian-occupied territories in Ukraine since the invasion began, shortly after the ICC issued an arrest warrant for him.
events.description: Russian President Vladimir Putin made an unannounced visit to the captured Ukrainian port city of Mariupol, marking his first trip to Russian-occupied territories in Ukraine since the invasion began, shortly after the ICC issued an arrest warrant for him.

events.name: Putin's Visit to Mariupol
events.wd_description: Russian President Vladimir Putin made a surprise visit to Mariupol, the first time he has visited Russian-occupied territories in Ukraine since the invasion began, following the ICC's issuance of an arrest warrant for him.
events.description: Russian President Vladimir Putin made a surprise visit to Mariupol, the first time he has visited Russian-occupied territories in Ukraine since the invasion began, following the ICC's issuance of an arrest warrant for him.

events.name: Significance of Mariupol in the War
events.wd_label: Significance of Mariupol in the War
events.wd_description: Mariupol, which fell in May 2022 after one of the bloodiest battles of the war, was Russia's first major victory in its invasion of Ukraine, after failing to capture Kyiv.
events.description: Mariupol, which fell in May 2022 after one of the bloodiest battles of the war, was Russia's first major victory in its invasion of Ukraine, after failing to capture Kyiv.

events.name: Meeting with Russian Military Leadership
events.wd_description: After visiting Mariupol, Putin traveled to Rostov, where he met with Valery Gerasimov, the chief of the general staff and a key commander in Russia's war effort in Ukraine.
events.description: After visiting Mariupol, Putin traveled to Rostov, where he met with Valery Gerasimov, the chief of the general staff and a key commander in Russia's war effort in Ukraine.

events.name: China Urges G20 to Address Global Debt Issues
events.wd_label: China Urges G20 to Address Global Debt Issues
events.wd_description: China called on G20 nations to conduct a fair and comprehensive analysis of global debt issues, emphasizing the need for joint actions by international financial institutions and commercial creditors.
events.description: China called on G20 nations to conduct a fair and comprehensive analysis of global debt issues, emphasizing the need for joint actions by international financial institutions and commercial creditors.

events.name: China's Call for Action
events.wd_description: China urged G20 nations to tackle global debt issues comprehensively and effectively, stressing the importance of joint actions by international financial institutions and commercial creditors.
events.description: China urged G20 nations to tackle global debt issues comprehensively and effectively, stressing the importance of joint actions by international financial institutions and commercial creditors.

events.name: G20 Finance Ministers Meeting
events.wd_description: China's Finance Minister Liu Kun participated in a video meeting with G20 finance ministers and central bank chiefs in Bengaluru, India, calling for a fair analysis of global debt issues.
events.description: China's Finance Minister Liu Kun participated in a video meeting with G20 finance ministers and central bank chiefs in Bengaluru, India, calling for a fair analysis of global debt issues.

events.name: Upcoming IMF Debt Roundtable
events.wd_description: Officials from the IMF, World Bank, and G7 nations will meet for the first face-to-face discussions at the new IMF Global Sovereign Debt Roundtable, with Zambia and Ghana awaiting China's support on debt restructuring.
events.description: Officials from the IMF, World Bank, and G7 nations will meet for the first face-to-face discussions at the new IMF Global Sovereign Debt Roundtable, with Zambia and Ghana awaiting China's support on debt restructuring.

events.name: Xi Jinping Meets with Vladimir Putin in Moscow
events.wd_label: Xi Jinping Meets with Vladimir Putin in Moscow
events.wd_description: Chinese President Xi Jinping met with Russian President Vladimir Putin in Moscow, marking Xi's first visit to Russia since the invasion of Ukraine began, with discussions centered on the ongoing war.
events.description: Chinese President Xi Jinping met with Russian President Vladimir Putin in Moscow, marking Xi's first visit to Russia since the invasion of Ukraine began, with discussions centered on the ongoing war.

events.name: Xi Jinping's Visit to Moscow
events.wd_description: Chinese President Xi Jinping visited Moscow to meet with Russian President Vladimir Putin, marking his first visit to Russia since the invasion of Ukraine began in 2022.
events.description: Chinese President Xi Jinping visited Moscow to meet with Russian President Vladimir Putin, marking his first visit to Russia since the invasion of Ukraine began in 2022.

events.name: Discussions on Ukraine
events.wd_description: The war in Ukraine was a key topic during the meeting between Xi Jinping and Vladimir Putin, with the discussion expected to continue throughout Xi's visit.
events.description: The war in Ukraine was a key topic during the meeting between Xi Jinping and Vladimir Putin, with the discussion expected to continue throughout Xi's visit.

events.name: US Response to Xi's Visit
events.wd_description: US Secretary of State Antony Blinken commented on Xi Jinping's visit, suggesting that China's decision to meet with Putin shortly after the ICC issued an arrest warrant for him indicates China's reluctance to hold Russia accountable for its actions in Ukraine.
events.description: US Secretary of State Antony Blinken commented on Xi Jinping's visit, suggesting that China's decision to meet with Putin shortly after the ICC issued an arrest warrant for him indicates China's reluctance to hold Russia accountable for its actions in Ukraine.

events.name: EV Battery Supply Chain and Logistics
events.wd_label: EV Battery Supply Chain and Logistics
events.wd_description: The automotive industry's supply chain for metals, plastics, and parts is adapting to the demands of electric vehicle (EV) batteries, involving unique logistics for lithium-ion battery components and raw materials.
events.description: The automotive industry's supply chain for metals, plastics, and parts is adapting to the demands of electric vehicle (EV) batteries, involving unique logistics for lithium-ion battery components and raw materials.

events.name: Current Supply Chain Overview
events.wd_description: The supply chain for EV batteries involves multiple stages, from raw material extraction to shipping finished batteries and vehicles, and is critical for meeting increasing EV demand.
events.description: The supply chain for EV batteries involves multiple stages, from raw material extraction to shipping finished batteries and vehicles, and is critical for meeting increasing EV demand.

events.name: Lithium-Ion Battery Components
events.wd_description: Lithium-ion batteries consist of lithium-ion cells, wires, a battery management system, and a casing, with cells grouped into modules and multiple modules forming the battery pack.
events.description: Lithium-ion batteries consist of lithium-ion cells, wires, a battery management system, and a casing, with cells grouped into modules and multiple modules forming the battery pack.

events.name: t: Anode
events.wd_description: The anode, or negative electrode, is most often made of graphite.
events.description: The anode, or negative electrode, is most often made of graphite.

events.name: t: Cathode
events.wd_description: The cathode, or positive electrode, can be made of lithium cobalt oxide, lithium iron phosphate, or lithium manganese oxide.
events.description: The cathode, or positive electrode, can be made of lithium cobalt oxide, lithium iron phosphate, or lithium manganese oxide.

events.name: t: Electrolyte
events.wd_description: The electrolyte transports positive lithium-ions between the anode and cathode, with lithium salt being the most common electrolyte.
events.description: The electrolyte transports positive lithium-ions between the anode and cathode, with lithium salt being the most common electrolyte.

events.name: t: Separator
events.wd_description: The separator is a thin sheet of material between the cathode and anode that controls ion flow to prevent electrical shorts, typically made from polyolefin.
events.description: The separator is a thin sheet of material between the cathode and anode that controls ion flow to prevent electrical shorts, typically made from polyolefin.

events.name: Shipping Raw Materials for Lithium Mining
events.wd_label: Shipping Raw Materials for Lithium Mining
events.wd_description: The raw materials for lithium mining, including caustic soda, sodium cyanide, nitric acid, cobalt, and graphite, are shipped to lithium mines by truck or rail.
events.description: The raw materials for lithium mining, including caustic soda, sodium cyanide, nitric acid, cobalt, and graphite, are shipped to lithium mines by truck or rail.

events.name: Shipping Lithium Carbonate to Lithium Hydroxide Producers
events.wd_label: Shipping Lithium Carbonate to Lithium Hydroxide Producers
events.wd_description: After processing lithium chloride into lithium carbonate, it is shipped to facilities in the U.S. or China for further processing into lithium hydroxide.
events.description: After processing lithium chloride into lithium carbonate, it is shipped to facilities in the U.S. or China for further processing into lithium hydroxide.

events.name: Shipping Battery Cell Components
events.wd_description: Materials to make battery cell components, such as lithium carbonate and lithium hydroxide, are shipped to Asia where cathodes, anodes, electrolytes, and separators are produced.
events.description: Materials to make battery cell components, such as lithium carbonate and lithium hydroxide, are shipped to Asia where cathodes, anodes, electrolytes, and separators are produced.

events.name: Shipping Battery Cells to Manufacturers
events.wd_description: After producing lithium-ion battery cells in Asia, they are imported back to the U.S. for use by battery module and pack producers.
events.description: After producing lithium-ion battery cells in Asia, they are imported back to the U.S. for use by battery module and pack producers.

events.name: Shipping Finished Batteries to OEMs
events.wd_description: Battery modules are assembled into battery packs, which are then shipped to original equipment manufacturers (OEMs).
events.description: Battery modules are assembled into battery packs, which are then shipped to original equipment manufacturers (OEMs).

events.name: Shipping EVs to End Markets
events.wd_description: Once EV batteries are installed in vehicles, the finished electric vehicles are shipped to dealerships or other end markets for sale to consumers.
events.description: Once EV batteries are installed in vehicles, the finished electric vehicles are shipped to dealerships or other end markets for sale to consumers.

events.name: Battery Recycling
events.wd_description: At the end of their useful life, EV batteries can be recycled, with materials like cobalt, lithium, manganese, nickel, and graphite being reused in new batteries.
events.description: At the end of their useful life, EV batteries can be recycled, with materials like cobalt, lithium, manganese, nickel, and graphite being reused in new batteries.
